title: Textile, 1770s
medium:
Medium: linen warp, cotton weft
Technique: block printed on plain weave.
inscribed: C has incomplete cloth marks on it consisting of incomplete numbers.
dimensions:
A. Warp: 220 cm (86 1/4 in.); Weft: (selvage to selvage) 85 cm (33 3/8 in.)
B. Warp: 225.5 cm (88 1/2 in.); Weft: (selvage to selvage) 85 cm (33 3/8 in.)
C. Warp: 19.5 cm (7 5/8 in.); Weft: 41.5 cm (16 1/4 in.)
description: Ogival center line patter in red on white. Two blocks were needed to print the pattern. The size of each block was 33 cm high by 21.5 cm wide.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1770s.
1770s. Medium: linen warp, cotton weft
Technique: block printed on plain weave.. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-247-a/c.
